name: Bomb Stopper (Unity version)
description:
Github: https://github.com/King9999/Bomb-Stopper-Unity

This is the last of the old Flash games I wanted to remake. Like Colour Shmup, the Unity version of Bomb Stopper is significantly improved (too bad you can't play the old version to see how much better the new game is!). When I originally came up with the idea, I thought it would be neat to make a game that could help people to improve their typing or spelling, but still be entertaining.

How to Play

  • Type the words you see on-screen before the time runs out and the bomb explodes. 
  • If you type the words correctly without errors or corrections, you can get combos that add a multiplier to your score.
  • Incorrect words will result in a stun, where you cannot type for a duration.

Note: The downloadable version will allow you to copy and paste your results wherever you like. WebGL does not allow copying to the clipboard.

Credits

Most graphics are from Kenney: https://kenney.itch.io/kenney-game-assets-1

Music is from here: https://tallbeard.itch.io/music-loop-bundle
